entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
